main-menu-help: DRAG AND DROP ENEMIES IN THE PORTAL TO PLAY
tutorial_step1:
Choose a bubble-emitting plant near an ore patch and place an energy source machine on top of it

If you missplace the machines you can destroy them
tutorial_step2: Use the energy distributor machine to allow some ore tiles to get energy
tutorial_step3: Place a miner on top of the ores
tutorial_step4: Place a flying bot anywhere on the map to give energy to your future plants
tutorial_step5: Place at least one plant near the path of the enemies to kill them
energy_distributor-desc: Amplifies energy signal to reach miners
miner-desc: Mines ores that can restore plants energy
bot-desc: Collects ores from miners and gives them to plants
eye_flower-desc: Plant that shoots 5 projectiles at once
mushroom-desc: Plant that shoots gelly that slows down enemies
cactus_ball-desc: Fat plant that shoots a projectile that explodes in 8 spikes
light_flower-desc: Plant that shoots a laser beam dealing consistent damage to an enemy
pepper-desc: Plant that shoots seeds that set fire to the enemies
dark_tentacles-desc: Tentacled plant that spawns tentacles right below the enemies
corn-desc: Plant that shoots highly explosive mais seeds
tech_tree-desc: Tech plant that spawns an ally bot hitting more than one enemy
eye-desc: Plant that can shoot powerful feathers from far away
eater-desc: Plant that shoots acid that gives a poison effect to the enemies
cactus_tower-desc: Tall plant that shoots spikes with a high frequency
